Translations.Text: Uttare tamra ka'oma sudhu e kathati'i balalo, luta paribarake tomadera janapada theke bera kare da'o. Era to emana loka yara sudhu pakapabitra sajate caya.
Atahpara tamke o tamra paribarabargake ud'dhara karalama tamra stri chara. Kenana, tara jan'ye dhbansapraptadera bhagya'i nirdharita karechilama.
Ara tadera upara barsana karechilama musaladhare brsti. Se'i satarkakrtadera upara kata'i na maratnaka chila se brsti.
Bala, sakala prasansa'i allahara ebam santi tamra manonita bandaganera prati! Srestha ke? Allaha na ora-tara yaderake sarika sabyasta kare.

Bala to ke srsti karechena nabhomandala o bhumandala ebam akasa theke tomadera jan'ye barsana karechena pani; atahpara ta dbara ami manorama bagana srsti karechi. Tara brksadi utpanna karara sakti'i tomadera ne'i. Ata'eba, allahara sathe an'ya kona upasya ache ki? Baram tara satyabicyuta sampradaya.

Bala to ke prthibike basopayogi karechena ebam tara majhe majhe nada-nadi prabahita karechena ebam take sthita rakhara jan'ye parbata sthapana karechena ebam du'i samudrera majhakhane antaraya rekhechena. Ata'eba, allahara sathe an'ya kona upasya ache ki? Baram tadera adhikansa'i jane na.

Bala to ke nihsahayera dake sara dena yakhana se dake ebam kasta duribhuta karena ebam tomaderake prthibite purbabartidera sthalabhisikta karena. Sutaram allahara sathe an'ya kona upasya ache ki? Tomara ati saman'ya'i dhyana kara.

Bala to ke tomaderake jale o sthale andhakare patha dekhana ebam yini tamra anugrahera purbe susambadabahi batasa prerana karena? Ata'eba, allahara sathe an'ya kona upasya ache ki? Tara yake sarika kare, allaha ta theke aneka urdhbe.

Bala to ke prathamabara srsti karena, atahpara take punaraya srsti karabena ebam ke tomaderake akasa o marta?2469;Eke riyika dana karena. Sutaram allahara sathe an'ya kona upasya ache ki? Baluna, tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe tomadera pramana upasthita kara.
Baluna, allaha byatita nabhomandala o bhumandale ke'u gayabera khabara jane na ebam tara jane na ye, tara kakhana punarujjibita habe.
Baram parakala samparke tadera jnana nihsesa haye geche; baram tara e bisaye sandeha posana karache baram e bisaye tara andha.
Kapherara bale, yakhana amara o amadera bapa-dadara mrttika haye yaba, takhana'o ki amaderake punarut'thita kara habe
e'i oyadaprapta hayechi amara ebam purba theke'i amadera bapa-dadara. Eta to purbabartidera upakatha bai kichu naya.
Baluna, prthibi paribhramana kara ebam dekha aparadhidera parinati ki hayeche.
Tadera karane apani duhkhita habena na ebam tara ye cakranta kareche ete manahksunna habena na.
Tara bale, tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, e'i oyada kakhana purna habe
baluna, asambhaba ki, tomara yata druta kamana karacha tadera kiyadansa tomadera pithera upara ese geche.
Apanara palanakarta manusera prati anugrahasila, kintu tadera adhikansa'i krtajnata prakasa kare na.
Tadera antara ya gopana kare ebam ya prakasa kare apanara palanakarta abasya'i ta janena.
Akase o prthibite emana kona gopana bheda ne'i, ya suspasta kitabe na ache.
E'i kora'ana bani isara'ila yesaba bisaye matabirodha kare, tara adhikansa tadera kache barnana kare.
Ebam niscita'i eta muminadera jan'ye hedayeta o rahamata.
Apanara palanakarta nija sasanaksamata anuyayi tadera madhye phayasala kare debena. Tini parakramasali, subijna.
Ata'eba, apani allahara upara bharasa karuna. Niscaya apani satya o spasta pathe achena.
Apani ahabana sonate parabena na mrtaderake ebam badhirake'o naya, yakhana tara prstha pradarsana kare cale yaya.
Apani andhaderake tadera pathabhrastata theke phiriye satpathe anate parabena na. Apani kebala taderake sonate parabena, yara amara ayatasamuhe bisbasa kare. Ata'eba, tara'i ajnabaha.
